    • Method Detail

      • selectPath

        public DfsPath selectPath(ModelNode origin,
                          SimulationTask task,
                          long sTime,
                          ModelServerNode forceTarget,
                          SimulationType simType)
                   throws NoPathAvailableException,
                          FsObjectNotFoundException,
                          NotMountedException
        Description copied from interface: DfsPathPicker
        Select path from origin to any destination server, based on simulation task task.
        Specified by:
        selectPath in interface DfsPathPicker
        Parameters:
        origin - origin node
        task - simulation task associated with this path select
        sTime - simulation time
        forceTarget - if we want the path to end at this target server (if null, best target will be selected)
        simType - simulation type
        Returns:
        selected path
        Throws:
        NoPathAvailableException - when there is no path from origin to a target object given by task
        FsObjectNotFoundException - when the file associated with task cannot be found
        NotMountedException - when the file associated with task is not mounted

      • getObjectRegistryQueryTime

        public long getObjectRegistryQueryTime(ModelClientNode origin)
                                throws NoNeighboursAvailableException
        Description copied from interface: DfsPathPicker
        Get the amount of the required to query any registry (metadata server). Usually used when we are asking if some file exists or not - this will give us the time (latency) required to contact registry.
        Specified by:
        getObjectRegistryQueryTime in interface DfsPathPicker
        Parameters:
        origin - origin node
        Returns:
        amount of time
        Throws:
        NoNeighboursAvailableException - when origin has no server neighbours
